table.emptyRow: There are no faxes listed under this Fax Box

empty.headline: In order to view and manage faxes, first select the desired fax box in this account.
empty.subtitle: Use the 'Filter to a specific Faxbox' above and to the left.

deleteConfirm.content: Deleting the {{variable}} selected faxes(s) will permanently remove them from the system. This action can not be undone or reversed, and the affected files will be gone forever.
deleteConfirm.title: Are you sure?
deleteConfirm.success: You successfully deleted the selected faxes from the system!

resendConfirm.content: You are attempting to redeliver {{variable}} faxes. Are you sure you want to attempt re-delivery?
resendConfirm.title: Are you sure?
resendConfirm.success: You successfully tried to re-send the selected faxes!
